patterns.pattern: You feel a fish nibbling on your hook.
You see the water ripple as a fish makes a medium strike at your bait.
You feel a fish make a small strike at your bait.
You stagger as a fish makes a large strike at your bait.
Relaxing the tension on your line, you are able to reel again.
You quickly jerk back your fishing pole and feel the line go taut. You've hooked
^You quickly jerk back your fishing pole and feel the line go taut. You've hooked (.+) fish!$
